He's techrod108 approved. (lol)
@Katneni143 - I (probably) won't get to Clash (and Wrath) of the Titans any time soon. I would like to do them tho...

After downloading all your Pixar stuff in 720p quality, I tried this one to see if it would play on my old PowerMac G5 2x1.8GHz, Mac OS 10.5.8 with VLC v 2.0.1.
Well, it plays perfectly well, except that I don't seem to have access to the subtitles.
Anyway, thanks again for the exceptionnal quality of your work !

video : 10/10.
audio : 10/10.

You're a Master !

@woritstoh - thx for doing the testing for me. I wonder if VLC 2.0.2 makes any difference? I seem to recall that it brings some features back in for PowerPC machines.

And I appreciate the kind words. :)
i have noticed that you have included most of the pixar films are u going to include Finding Nemo? cuz i would very much enjoy that. thank you. you rock! :)
